Interface GameEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameEventListener
Listener interface for game events such as entity deaths, creation, and sun generation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onCollectSunFromSunflower(Sunflower sf)
    Player collects sun directly from a sunflower.
    void
    onCollectSunFromTile(Tile tile)
    Player collects a dropped sun from a tile.
    void
    onDroppedSun(Tile tile)
    Sun has dropped on the specified tile.
    void
    onPlantKilled(Plant p)
    Called when a plant dies due to damage or effects.
    void
    onPlantRemoved(Plant p)
    Called when a plant is manually removed by the player.
    void
    onReadySun(Sunflower sf)
    Sunflower is ready to be harvested by the player.
    void
    onSetPlant(Plant p)
    Invoked after a plant is successfully placed on the board.
    void
    onZombieGenerated(Zombie z)
    Called when a zombie is created/spawned.
    void
    onZombieKilled(Zombie z)
    Called when a zombie is killed and removed from the board.
    void
    onZombieMove(Tile newTile, Tile currentTile, Zombie z)
    Fired whenever a zombie moves to a new tile.

  • Method Details

    • onZombieKilled

      void onZombieKilled(Zombie z)
      Called when a zombie is killed and removed from the board.
      Parameters:
      z - zombie that died

    • onPlantKilled

      void onPlantKilled(Plant p)
      Called when a plant dies due to damage or effects.
      Parameters:
      p - plant that was killed

    • onPlantRemoved

      void onPlantRemoved(Plant p)
      Called when a plant is manually removed by the player.
      Parameters:
      p - plant that was removed

    • onZombieMove

      void onZombieMove(Tile newTile, Tile currentTile, Zombie z)
      Fired whenever a zombie moves to a new tile.
      Parameters:
      newTile - tile the zombie moved to
      currentTile - previous tile of the zombie
      z - zombie that moved

    • onZombieGenerated

      void onZombieGenerated(Zombie z)
      Called when a zombie is created/spawned.
      Parameters:
      z - new zombie instance

    • onSetPlant

      void onSetPlant(Plant p)
      Invoked after a plant is successfully placed on the board.
      Parameters:
      p - newly placed plant

    • onCollectSunFromSunflower

      void onCollectSunFromSunflower(Sunflower sf)
      Player collects sun directly from a sunflower.
      Parameters:
      sf - sunflower that generated the sun

    • onCollectSunFromTile

      void onCollectSunFromTile(Tile tile)
      Player collects a dropped sun from a tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - tile from which sun was collected

    • onDroppedSun

      void onDroppedSun(Tile tile)
      Sun has dropped on the specified tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - tile receiving a sun drop

    • onReadySun

      void onReadySun(Sunflower sf)
      Sunflower is ready to be harvested by the player.
      Parameters:
      sf - sunflower containing ready sun
